channel.title: CLICK HERE FOR REPP++! Quick Help!
channel.description:
Okay, hey guys quick summary sorry.. I'm a PI coder not a Delta coder and I have a quick question about a Delta Client I'm trying to remake my beloved server 'Jag3x' from back in 2009 and I have 1 question.
The 'Enter' Button when you click to login the first button that appears on the client.. I'm trying to make it the only one so I deleted the 'About' button and now if you click where the old 'about' was it still goes to the about information.. How do I delete it from even going there? and just to go on 'Enter'.. Also heres a pic.. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/351a640.png[/img]

item.title: CLICK HERE FOR REPP++! Quick Help!
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

You didn’t change the clicking areas.
Client.java

Read full topic
